Example Code
The SDK contains a set of example applications that show how to interface with the Xsens Magnetic Field Mapper API. These examples can be found in the Examples directory of the MFM SDK. The path to he MFM SDK is represented by the MFMSDK environment variable.

To access the directory under Windows use 

%MFMSDK%\Examples


For Linux use 

$MFMSDK\Examples


The example directory consists of several sub directories. The following describes shortly the contents per sub directory:
DLL Example:

This directory contains a visual studio solution with a c++ example showing how to interface with the MFM SDK API in C++

Matlab

This directory contains a Matlab example that shows how to perform a magnetic field mapping from Matlab. It uses the COM interface.

CSharp

This directory contains a visual studio solution with an example showing how to interface with the MFM SDK API in C#

bin

This directory contains precompiled version of the examples
